definitions: the state of being unable to be used or obtained

examples.text: they complained about unavailability of refreshments during the long wait
a change in policy due to the unavailability of land

shortDefinitions: state of being unable to be used or obtained

definitions: the state of being otherwise occupied or not being free to do something

examples.text: the investigation was delayed due to unavailability of relevant staff
a fitness test on Thursday morning confirming his unavailability

shortDefinitions: state of not being free to do something
